summary: This bill, the Comprehensive Addiction Recovery through Effective Employment and Reentry Act of 2025 (CAREER Act), reauthorizes and amends programs under the SUPPORT for Patients and Communities Act. It focuses on reauthorizing treatment, recovery, and workforce support grants, and modifies the Recovery Housing Pilot Program. Key changes include updating data sources for rate calculations, allowing transportation services for grant recipients, and extending program funding periods. The bill aims to improve employment outcomes for individuals with substance use disorders and support recovery housing initiatives.
